summary: 2002 INTREPID POLICE CRUISERS EXPERIENCING BRAKE FAILURE INCLUDING WARPED ROTORS AT LOW MILEAGE.  WE'VE HAD TWO (OUT OF 7 VEHICLES) WITH THE PROBLEM ALREADY.  STAUNTON VA POLICE ISSUED BULLETIN 5/15 TO THEIR FORCES.  D/C IS DENYING ANY PROBLEMS.  PLEASE KEEP THIS ANONYMOUS - THEY ARE A SIGNIFICANT CUSTOMER OF OUR COMPANY.  *NLM
